segments.advisor_message: So, how would you describe your current state of health?
segments.client_message: Um, well, I thought I was doing okay, but now that I think about it, I've been dealing with some headaches, like almost every day.

segments.advisor_message: That sounds uncomfortable. Have you ever smoked or do you smoke currently?
segments.client_message: Actually, I used to smoke, I think I mentioned two packs a week, but now I'm not so sure. I don't smoke now but I started when I was, um, around 19. But it’s been a while since I quit.
